original: Lundberg, Carl Gustaf Albert, disponent, Tidan, f. 2/5/91 i Sthlm av tj :-man Albert L. o. Tekla Larsson. G. 15 m. Carin Falk. Barn: Anne-Marie f. 23, Inga-Greta 25, Carin Helena 30, Svante 32. — Genomg. fem kl. v. östra real i Sthlm, Schartaus hand:inst. 10. Anst. i Westergötl. Yllefabr. A-B (num. Sv. Yilekoncernen A-B) »sed. II. Led. av styr. f. detta bol. m. dotterföretag, Sv. ullirnportfören., Sv. yl-leind:fören. o. Textilrådet, ordf. i Sv. textilfabrikantfören. o. Ullspinneri- o. väverifören. RNO, RVO, KFinlLO.
translated: Lundberg, Carl Gustaf Albert, manager, Tidan, b. 2/5/91 in Stockholm, son of Albert L. and Tekla Larsson. Married on 15 m. to Carin Falk. Children: Anne-Marie, b. 1923, Inga-Greta, b. 1925, Carin Helena, b. 1930, Svante, b. 1932. Completed five years at Östra Real in Stockholm, Schartaus Business Institute in 1910. Employed at Westergötl. Wool Factory A-B (currently part of the Swedish Wool Corporation A-B) since 1911. Member of the board of this company and its subsidiaries, Swedish Wool Import Association, Swedish Wool Industry Association, and Textile Council. Chairman of the Swedish Textile Manufacturers' Association and Wool Spinning and Weaving Association. Awarded RNO, RVO, KFinlLO.
